title: Savoury hotpot
description: This simple recipe for a comforting sausage and bean hotpot makes a tasty weeknight supper to make with the kids.

default: few stalks fresh thyme, leaves only

steps: Mix all of the ingredients together in a lidded ovenproof dish and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Cook in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sausages are cooked through. Serve with mashed potato or crusty bread.
